journal: Acta Crystallographica Section C Crystal Structure Communications
title: A hydrogen-bonded ribbon in 6-amino-3-methyl-5-nitroso-2-(pyrrolidin-1-yl)pyrimidin-4(3H)-one monohydrate and hydrogen-bonded sheets in 6-amino-2-dimethylamino-3-methyl-5-nitrosopyrimidin-4(3H)-one monohydrate. Corrigendum
